short_summary: Fire Alarm Inspection, Maintenance and Repair - Dorchester Penitentiary, Springhill Institution and Nova Institution for Women
description: This procurement is a contract award notice. It is posted to inform the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services, or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities.
duration_in_months: For a period of ten (10) months, from date awarded to October 2, 2025 and who option to extend the contract for two additional one-year periods.
